Package ohos.media.image.common

Class ImageFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.image.common.ImageFormat

  • public final class ImageFormat
extends Object
    Defines the image format and provides interfaces for obtaining image format information.

    This class defines how image data is organized and represented, and provides interfaces for obtaining the number of image format components and bits per pixel adopted by a format.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#IMAGE

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ImageFormat.ComponentType
      Describes the component type of encoding formats.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int H264

      static int H265
      Indicates the H265 encoding format.
      static int JPEG
      Indicates the JPEG encoding format.
      static int NV21
      Indicates the YUV420 format with NV21 encoding.
      static int RAW10
      Indicates the RAW10 format with 10 bits per component.
      static int RAW16
      Indicates the RAW10 format with 16 bits per component.
      static int UNKNOWN
      Indicates an unknown encoding format.
      static int YUV420_888
      Indicates the generic YUV420 format with 8 bits per component (Y, U, and V).
